0,0.title: The Quiet Clearing
0,0.text: Once used by travelers as a hidden campfire spot. You sense ancient echoes here.

2,-1.title: Watcher’s Edge
2,-1.text: From this high ridge, one could see distant war fires in the old days.

-3,4.title: Shatterbone Pass
-3,4.text: This narrow canyon is said to hold the bones of a fallen giant, broken across the trail.

1,3.title: Marsh of Thorns
1,3.text: These wetlands were the site of a cursed bloom—plants that whisper when no one's near.

-2,-2.title: Old Sentinel
-2,-2.text: An ancient tree stands here, carved with glyphs. It is said to mark the old boundary of Fogreach.
